https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dKIJrcSlTH4ls9onVg86lqYpKQm.jpg A young female breakdancer, Angel, moves to Los Angeles after an attack by an ex-boyfriend nearly ends her dance career forever. B-Girl follows Angel through recovery and acceptance of a new life as she busts a move into the male-centric world of underground hip hop. B-Girl
